languages.text: {n}Ваша речь {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}бывалого комиссара{/d} находит свои цели: у нескольких пустотных головорезов сдают нервы, и они решают сменить сторону — скорее из-за паники, чем из безумной надежды на ваше милосердие.{/n}

{n}The words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former Commissar{/d} find their mark: several void thugs lose their nerve and promptly decide to switch sides — probably in panic rather than in some insane hope of receiving your mercy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваша речь {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}бывалого комиссара{/d} находит свои цели: у нескольких пустотных головорезов сдают нервы, и они решают сменить сторону — скорее из-за паники, чем из безумной надежды на ваше милосердие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former Commissar{/d} find their mark: several void thugs lose their nerve and promptly decide to switch sides — probably in panic rather than in some insane hope of receiving your mercy.{/n}

{n}The words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former Commissar{/d} find their mark: several void thugs lose their nerve and promptly decide to switch sides — probably in panic rather than in some insane hope of receiving your mercy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Worte eines {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}ehemaligen Kommissars{/d} erfüllen ihren Zweck: Einige der Piraten verlieren die Nerven und entschließen sich spontan, die Seiten zu wechseln ... vermutlich eher aus Panik, als aus einer sinnlosen Hoffnung auf Gnade.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former Commissar{/d} find their mark: several void thugs lose their nerve and promptly decide to switch sides — probably in panic rather than in some insane hope of receiving your mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Worte eines {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}ehemaligen Kommissars{/d} erfüllen ihren Zweck: Einige der Piraten verlieren die Nerven und entschließen sich spontan, die Seiten zu wechseln ... vermutlich eher aus Panik, als aus einer sinnlosen Hoffnung auf Gnade.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les paroles de l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}ex-commissaire{/d} font mouche : plusieurs malfrats du vide craquent et décident aussitôt de changer de camp... sans doute par panique, plutôt que dans l'espoir insensé d'obtenir votre clémence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former Commissar{/d} find their mark: several void thugs lose their nerve and promptly decide to switch sides — probably in panic rather than in some insane hope of receiving your mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les paroles de l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}ex-commissaire{/d} font mouche : plusieurs malfrats du vide craquent et décident aussitôt de changer de camp... sans doute par panique, plutôt que dans l'espoir insensé d'obtenir votre clémence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你这位{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}前任政委{/d}的发言发挥了作用，几位虚空海盗变得战战兢兢，立刻改变了立场。他们临阵倒戈的行为，与其说是渴望能得到你的怜悯，不如说是被你彻底吓破了胆。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former Commissar{/d} find their mark: several void thugs lose their nerve and promptly decide to switch sides — probably in panic rather than in some insane hope of receiving your mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你这位{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}前任政委{/d}的发言发挥了作用，几位虚空海盗变得战战兢兢，立刻改变了立场。他们临阵倒戈的行为，与其说是渴望能得到你的怜悯，不如说是被你彻底吓破了胆。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras como {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}antigu{mf|o|a} comisari{mf|o|a}{/d} dan en el blanco: varios matones del vacío pierden la compostura y deciden cambiar de bando, más por pánico que por vana esperanza de recibir clemencia por tu parte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former Commissar{/d} find their mark: several void thugs lose their nerve and promptly decide to switch sides — probably in panic rather than in some insane hope of receiving your mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras como {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}antigu{mf|o|a} comisari{mf|o|a}{/d} dan en el blanco: varios matones del vacío pierden la compostura y deciden cambiar de bando, más por pánico que por vana esperanza de recibir clemencia por tu parte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}元コミッサー{/d}の言葉が的を射る。数人のヴォイド暴徒が気後れし、即座に寝返ることにした。おそらく慈悲を受けられるという狂った希望よりも、恐怖からの行動だろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former Commissar{/d} find their mark: several void thugs lose their nerve and promptly decide to switch sides — probably in panic rather than in some insane hope of receiving your mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}元コミッサー{/d}の言葉が的を射る。数人のヴォイド暴徒が気後れし、即座に寝返ることにした。おそらく慈悲を受けられるという狂った希望よりも、恐怖からの行動だろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Eski Komiser'in{/d} sözleri yerini buluyor: Birkaç uçsuz haydudu cesaretlerini yitiriyor ve derhâl taraf değiştirmeye karar veriyor. Muhtemelen onlara merhamet etmeni ummaktan ziyade panikle böyle bir harekette bulunuyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former Commissar{/d} find their mark: several void thugs lose their nerve and promptly decide to switch sides — probably in panic rather than in some insane hope of receiving your mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Eski Komiser'in{/d} sözleri yerini buluyor: Birkaç uçsuz haydudu cesaretlerini yitiriyor ve derhâl taraf değiştirmeye karar veriyor. Muhtemelen onlara merhamet etmeni ummaktan ziyade panikle böyle bir harekette bulunuyorlar.{/n}
